page.title: 14SOCIAL LIFE IN HUMBIE.
page.content: CONCERTS,WHIST DRIVES AND DANCES ARE HELD OCCASIONALLY IN THE VILLAGE HALL. THERE ARE REGULAR KEEP FIT CLASSES AND THE W.R.I.AND GUILD ARE HELD MONTHLY.A MOTHER AND TODDLER GROUP MEETS ONCE A WEEK.THIS WAS FORMERLY A PLAYGROUP BUT THERE ARE NO LONGER ENOUGH OLDER CHILDREN.THIS MEANS THAT THE GROUP NO LONGER RECEIVES A GRANT.UNFORTUNATELY THERE IS NOTHING FOR CHILDREN AND TEENAGERS TO DO IN THE EVENINGS.SOME OF US GO SWIMMING AND OTHERS ARE LEARNING GYMNASTICS AND JUDO BUT SUCH ACTIVITIES ARE HELD OUTSIDE OUR SQUARE.THIS MEANS THAT CHILDREN WHO DON'T HAVE TRANSPORT CAN'T JOIN IN AND OUR PARENTS NEED TO DRIVE US AS THE BUS SERVICE IS VERY POOR.
